messages.name: Alex
messages.message: OMG!!! This is brilliant! How do you not have so many more subscribers!?!? I'm definitely subbing for more of this great content. <3

messages.name: Windy
messages.message: This would make a great show trailer, shows the level of violence, the action, the mystery, the comedy, and drama the show has

messages.name: IssinAsina
messages.message: This song is the best for any kind of amv, change my mind

messages.name: Mr. Dimple
messages.message: Man, this is amazing. I've watched plenty of AMV's and most were pretty mediocre. This really stands out. Splendid job! Not sure on this one, but I feel like most people try to make AMV's tell a story which usually doesn't work out for the final result. I feel like what you did - just getting really cool shots from the anime and making it really fit with the song is the perfect thing to do for an AMV. Once again, hats off. Good job!

messages.name: Father Ariandel
messages.message: HOW DOES THIS ONLY HAVE 5K VIEWS?

messages.name: Django
messages.message: Honestly amazing, an AMV where the scenes and sounds actually work with the song
